abstract: A vintage photo of Mitt Romney, the Republican presidential contender, the former Massachusetts governor and Bain Capital founder, could be problematic for his campaign, at a time when Wall Street is under siege from protesters angry about rising income inequality and corporate greed.
snippet: A vintage photo of Mitt Romney, the Republican presidential contender, the former Massachusetts governor and Bain Capital founder, could be problematic for his campaign, at a time when Wall Street is under siege from protesters angry about rising...
lead_paragraph: A vintage photo of Mitt Romney -- the Republican presidential contender, the former Massachusetts governor and Bain Capital founder -- is making the rounds on the Internet. (Due to those annoying copyright rules and the fact that Bain Capital says it doesn't own the photo, we can't post it, but you can see it here.)

headline.main: Romney's Rainmakers: Where Are They Now?
